description: This is a market on whether a Red Bull car or a Mercedes-AMG Petronas car will win the French Grand Prix. The market will resolve to “Red Bull” if a Red Bull car wins the French Grand Prix, or “Mercedes” if a Mercedes-AMG Petronas car wins the French Grand Prix. If neither a Red Bull car nor a Mercedes-AMG Petronas car wins the French Grand Prix, then the market will resolve to 50-50. If for any reason the French Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before July 1, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the French Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date after July 1, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
